title: What will the Queen make of Harry and Meghan's Panorama-like outpouring?
text:
2019 is starting to feel like another annus horribilis for the monarchy. First we had the allegations surrounding Prince Andrew’s friendship with the convicted paedophile Jeffrey Epstein. Then the Queen was dragged into a constitutional crisis over Brexit.

And now the Duke and Duchess of Sussex have given a television interview that feels on a par with Princess Diana’s explosive sit-down with Panorama.

By appearing to suggest that she can no longer continue in the Royal Family as it stands, Meghan appears to be not only casting aspersions on the British tabloids but also the Firm she married into.

Her revelation to interviewer Tom Bradby that: “Not many people have asked if I’m okay,” appears...
description: 2019 is starting to feel like another annus horribilis for the monarchy.
